text: (Isaan) warra hamtuu isinitti eeganuudhaYoo injifannoon Rabbi irraa isiniif ta’e “nuti isinii wajjiin hin turree?” jedhuYoo carraan kaafirootaf ta’e immoo “sila nuti isin irratti akkaan hin hoggannee? Mu’uminoota isin irraa hin dhorginee?” jedhuRabbiin Guyyaa Qiyaamaa gidduu keessanitti ni murteessaRabbiin kaafirootaaf mu’uminoota irratti karaa hin godhu
